word_mean: 硒：一种类似硫的非金属元素，化学符号为Se，原子序数34，原子量为78.96。此元素是一种必需无机物，为谷胱甘肽过氧化物酶的一种成分，其功能通常认为与维生素E密切相关。另外，硒呈毒性水平亦见于几种生长于含高硒土壤内的植物中，可引起放牧动物中毒(见poisoning项下的selenium poisoning)。如食物中缺乏硒元素(见于含硒量较低的土壤)将引起心肌病(见disease项下的Kashan disease)

sentence.Network_en: Selenium and aluminum are found in vanishingly small concentrations within living things.
sentence.Network_cn: 硒和铝在生物中含量其微.

sentence.Network_en: Apart from selenium and vapour - deposited germanium and silicon, glasses are at least diatomic.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了硒和汽相沉积的锗和硅之外, 玻璃至少是二原子的.

sentence.Network_en: But inorganic selenite is just as nutritionally effective as selenium in organic form.
sentence.Network_cn: 但无机的亚硒酸盐却是以有机形式的硒起着营养作用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 硒（selenium）（Selenium）——保护免疫系统的元素，硒（selenium）是一种相当重要的抗氧化剂，参与人体新陈代谢过程。硒（selenium）被科学家称之为人体微量元素 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek selēnē 'moon'

means.word_mean: 1. a toxic nonmetallic element related to sulfur and tellurium; occurs in several allotropic forms; a stable gray metallike allotrope conducts electricity better in the light than in the dark and is used in photocells; occurs in sulfide ores (as pyrite)
